entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
